text: [Music]
once upon a time in a far-off land there
lived a poor Potter and his wife the old
man would work very hard to make his
pots but since pots were very cheap he
would always return with very little
money the couple had two children who
were both grown up the son's name was
Lionel he was an extremely handsome
young men but was scared of even the
smallest thing his sister Lily was as
pretty as a sunflower and was very kind
their parents loved them both dearly my
sweet children if only some luck came
our way they would live good lives all
in good time my dear lily is so sweet
something good will definitely come her
way and as for Lionel well Lionel
he has the name of a lion and the heart
of a tiny little kitten
he's brave at home what will that boy do
do not worry about him when the time is
right he will be the bravest of them all
and will put every other lion to shame
every other lion must already feel
ashamed on one beautiful day lily was
out in the woods humming to all the
pretty birds and animals in that same
wood a kind wizard happened to be there
he saw Lily singing happily and
immediately fell in love with her
astounding beauty Oh what could be more
charming than this beautiful forest oh
you my fair lady are the most charming
I've ever laid eyes on he presented Lily
with a rose and she fell in love with
his gentle eyes
Lily brought the wizard to her house and
told her parents that she wanted to
marry the wizard he is very kind and his
promise to look after me well that I
will live very far away and you will
never be able to meet us
her parents were astounded at this news
but they looked at their daughters smile
and gave her their blessings thank you
for giving Lily to me I promise that I
will cherish her forever here this is a
parting gift for you
goodbye father mother and Lionel I will
come to visit you someday and with a
snap of his fingers they disappeared in
an instant the family had now become
very rich with the gifts given by the
wizard the Potter and his wife were now
happy but over the days Lionel started
to miss his sister dreadfully oh how I
miss Lily now I have no one to fight
with hmm what is this commotion about he
saw people crowding around a man who was
selling something
Lionel tried to see what it was Oh what
is it what is it hmm all these shoes in
the key why is this crowd so excited to
buy just these two silly things yeah boy
these are not just the things these are
the magical boots and the magic a key
really but they look so ordinary oh
they're not the boots when one where is
them we'll take that person wherever
they wish to go in the key will open up
any closed door in the world then I want
them I will buy them from you here will
this be enough this is a plenty
lyonell put the key in his pocket and
wore the boots now let's see if these
work magic boots take me to where my
sister is and in a flash he found
himself standing right next to his
sister and the wizard Oh Lily Oh Lily I
missed you so very much
My Luck has brought me to you but how
did you get here
these boots brought me here they are
magical aren't they wonderful magical
boots I see well why don't you stay with
us no I only came to see if you were
well and happy and also I am very
excited to use these boots and see
another land I knew you didn't care
about me so much well then I would
advise you to go to the land of crystals
I have heard the king is a very friendly
man you will definitely welcome you go
and see you later
and you won't regret going there the
land of crystals sounds good to me
here take this crystal ball with you
what is this for and how does it work
you will find out when you really need
it
Lionel's said goodbye to them as he got
ready to go I wish to be in the land of
crystals and immediately he was standing
in a beautiful land where the houses
were adorned with crystals of every
color the men and women wore sparkling
bright crystals in their hair and on
their clothes
this is also amazing everything I see
shine so beautifully I can't stop
staring and the people here look so
happy
well I guess being surrounded by such
beautiful things who wouldn't be happy
now let me visit the King magic boots
take me to the king of crystals Wow am I
already in the palace it's even more
amazing
now how do I find that who are you and
they're set the king of the crystal and
having his royal breakfast with his
daughter Ruby the king was very shocked
to see Lionel and stared at him in
disbelief tell me who are you and how
have you entered my palace
I I am Lionel your majesty I came upon
some magic boots heard about your
wonderful Kingdom and well now I stand
here magic boots how do they work well I
just have to say the name of the place I
want to go and voila the boots
take me there the Crystal King was very
interested in the boots why don't you
join us for breakfast this is my
daughter Ruby on seeing Ruby Lionel's
heart melted as her beauty surpassed all
other maidens he had ever met I would be
honored magic boots take me to the seat
beside Ruby the princess of crystal land
oh they really are magic how long have
you been in my kingdom I have been here
for just a few minutes but whatever I
saw in those few minutes is more than
I've ever seen in my whole life
the people here also seem very happy I
would be as happy as them as well if
only I wasn't getting old and also if my
daughter would marry
I never said I wouldn't he just says
that I would only Mele the man who
managed to kill the beast beast what
beast well the people of this land are
indeed happy but that is only until
sundown when evening arrives every
person must go inside as a beast comes
to terrorize us all no one knows where
it lives or how to get rid of it and I
want to Mele the man who finds out and
succeeds now do you see why I'm so
unhappy a beast huh is it fearsome very
the mere sight of it would make a man
scream like a little mouse and you won't
marry any other type of brave man what
if he killed hairy spiders those I could
kill with my little finger
[Music]
poor Lionel was so terrified at what
princess Ruby had said but he had fallen
deeply for her beauty and wanted to win
her heart somehow fine I will do it I
will defeat this horrible beast what
impossible didn't you hear me no one
knows where the Beast lies I will find
out its lair trust me my king I will end
this reign of terror for you that
evening as Lionel was getting ready to
go he wondered what he was going to do
what have I done I have no clue what to
do when I find the Beast the other ways
I'll see when I get to it I must be
brave magic boots take me to where the
Beast resides and the next second Lionel
found himself standing in front of a
huge door deep in the forest behind him
were long and thick vines hanging from a
tree I hid in door no wonder no one
could find its lair he tried opening the
door but it was shut tight
[Music]
this door won't budge how do I wait the
key and out from his pocket he took out
the magical key that would open any door
oh I hope you work these please work yes
the door creaked and opened slowly to
reveal a dark entrance no I will enter
this and face the Beast
nothing will scare the great light I can
do this so Lionel took hold of his

inside he snuck around quietly no sign

sleeping soundly it was very terrifying
to look at it and its snoring was so
loud that all the things in the cave
shook and trembled
[Music]
find a way to finish it Lionel went and
stood closer to it he bent a little

mighty Beast from his deep slumber
he woke and looked at more Lionel who
was so scared he couldn't move at all -
you went to my divert disturb march slay
the Beast caught Lionel with its huge

silly
Aoyama dispenser bye guys how did you

little be strong well you see this magic

I desire a budgie crystal ball yes well
that won't do you any good now that I've

him great beast how strong you look but
are you really as strong as they say I
am just a traveler and was curious to
see
all in this stone is did - that is ever
walk the planet no one would dare
challenge me you are lying
how can someone be so strong unless your
power is fake boy pushes
our human unlike your fate shiny ball my

within the crystal cave of this land

ever since I started to run wow you
really are a very strong and brave Beast
oh yeah Oh toy well that's enough
chitchat I must go out not now for I am
very very hungry oh don't worry I will
lick you later
hahaha the Beast walked out of the cave
and went to terrorize the people of the
kingdom leaving Lionel feeling very
scared yeah thank goodness he's gone he
has told me enough to escape magic boots
take me to the crystal cave and as he
opened his eyes he saw he was in a
beautiful dark hollow cave filled with
small sparkly crystals they were of so
many colours and were so pretty that
Lionel almost forgot why he had come
there no I must focus I have to find the
beasts heart quickly but how there are
so many crystals which one is the beasts
heart suddenly the crystal ball began to
glow in his hands he looked at it in
wonder
hmmm strange it isn't showing me
anything and as he looked at the
crystals through the ball one of them
changed color that must be yet that must
be the beasts heart I found it
he took the crystal and threw it to the
ground
it fell and smashed into a million
pieces which disappeared
[Music]
I've done it magic boots take me back to

dear me
you always startled me when I'm eating

and your people will now be safe
oh how we must now rejoice thank you my

that's left to make me extremely happy
Ruby
he did finish off the beast and as I

the next day a grand ceremony was held

wasn't time to kill a mighty beast like

and I am happy to have such a sweet and
